plot: The film is a coming of age comedy about a young Italian-American womanizer who finally meets his match when he gets used and dumped by the hard-to-get Ciara.
title: About a Broads
plot_es: The film is a coming of age comedy about a young Italian-American womanizer who finally meets his match when he gets used and dumped by the hard-to-get Ciara.
plot_en: The film is a coming of age comedy about a young Italian-American womanizer who finally meets his match when he gets used and dumped by the hard-to-get Ciara.
